an7.65:1.1: “Hirottappe, bhikkhave, asati hirottappavipannassa hatupaniso hoti indriyasamvaro;
an7.65:1.2: indriyasamvare asati indriyasamvaravipannassa hatupanisam hoti silam;
an7.65:1.3: sile asati silavipannassa hatupaniso hoti sammasamadhi;
an7.65:1.4: sammasamadhimhi asati sammasamadhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an7.65:1.5: yathabhutananadassane asati yathabhutananadassanavipannassa hatupaniso hoti nibbidavirago;
an7.65:1.6: nibbidavirage asati nibbidaviragavipannassa hatupanisam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an7.65:1.8: Tassa papatikapi na paripurim gacchati, tacopi pheggupi saropi na paripurim gacchati.
an7.65:1.9: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, hirottappe asati hirottappavipannassa hatupaniso hoti indriyasamvaro;
an7.65:1.10: indriyasamvare asati indriyasamvaravipannassa hatupanisam hoti silam;
an7.65:1.11: sile asati silavipannassa hatupaniso hoti sammasamadhi;
an7.65:1.12: sammasamadhimhi asati sammasamadhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an7.65:1.13: yathabhutananadassane asati yathabhutananadassanavipannassa hatupaniso hoti nibbidavirago;
an7.65:1.14: nibbidavirage asati nibbidaviragavipannassa hatupanisam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an7.65:2.1: Hirottappe, bhikkhave, sati hirottappasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti indriyasamvaro;
an7.65:2.2: indriyasamvare sati indriyasamvarasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti silam;
an7.65:2.3: sile sati silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammasamadhi;
an7.65:2.4: sammasamadhimhi sati sammasamadhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an7.65:2.5: yathabhutananadassane sati yathabhutananadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidavirago;
an7.65:2.6: nibbidavirage sati nibbidaviragasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an7.65:2.7: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, rukkho sakhapalasasampanno. Tassa papatikapi paripurim gacchati, tacopi pheggupi saropi paripurim gacchati.
